channel.title: Exploding stuff in xen makes too much damage?
channel.description:
Maybe I dont understand something about Xen, but im pretty sure these tings make too much exploding damage. I used to shoot them all the time but now?..
Map bm_c4a1b1
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3LUr1Czbx58&feature=youtu.be
